name: Air Hockey (itch) (NerfedAtBirth)
description:
You purchase an air hockey table, only to find out it's actually only playable in the virtual world. That's just sad. Even though you bought this air hockey table from a spoopy seller to basically waste $200 for nothing, at least you can play with your m8 online. Oh well! Rules are simple, score on your opponent's goal. Earn 11 points to win!

For Player 1, use WASD. For Player 2, use arrow keys.
